create.content: You are joining millions across the country in owning your own health by planning for care in advance. Your next steps:

Wonderful! Is it in PDF form?
Scan and save your document in high resolution to upload on your Mind My Health dashboard.
Download our free template, document your desired care, and follow the instructions on your Mind My Health Dashboard.

Currently, Mind My Health serves North Carolina and South Carolina. (Why North and South Carolina?)

However, we are continuing to grow and invite you to continue building your account. We will notify you as we expand into your state.

You may still store your documents with us and retrieve them upon request.
